name: BookContent
shortdesc: A document added to a book.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path to the BookContent, including the name of the BookContent.

property.name: status
property.shortdesc: The status of the book content object file.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The size of the BookContent file.

property.name: date
property.shortdesc: The date and time the BookContent was created.

property.name: documentPageRange
property.shortdesc: The page range of the book content object within the book.

property.name: filePath
property.shortdesc: The full path to the file.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the BookContent.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the BookContent (a Book).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the BookContent within its containing object.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the book. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. (Optional)

method.name: replace
method.shortdesc: Replaces a book content object with a new file. Note: If the new file replaces the current style source document, the new file becomes the style source document.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The full path name of the new book content object.

method.name: synchronize
method.shortdesc: Matches the formatting of the book content object to the style source document.

method.name: preflight
method.shortdesc: Preflight a book content object and optionally save the resulting report.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The preflight report to save to. (Optional)

parameters.name: autoOpen
parameters.shortdesc: If true, automatically open the report after creation. (Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BookContent.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
